resources:
World of Warcraft Board Game Assistant Tool
Stuff
Common Uncommon Rare Epic Artifact
Amulet of Protection Start of your dice pool step : If you are not rolling any red dice, you may add 3 green dice to your dice pool Trinket 5 17 0
AnkhOfLife Your health capacity is increased by 3 Trinket 2 7 0
Archeus Add 2 red dices, 1 blue dice and 1 green dice Sword 3 14 0
Avenger\'s Breastplate Add 2 green dices to your dice pool. During your Place Token step : For each armor token you place in the defense box, you may also place 1 hit token in the attrition box Mail 5 20 0
Bad Mojo Mask Add 1 green dice and 1 blue dice to your dice pool Helmet - Cloth 4 16 0
Biznick\'s Accurascope Start of your Place Token step : If you have a bow or gun equipped, you may place 1 hit token in the damage box Scope - Bow or Gun 4 18 0
Bloodrazor Add 3 red dices to your dice pool. Start of your Place Token step : If it is at least the second round of combat, place 2 hit tokens in the damage box Sword 4 15 0
Cannonball Runner End of your Reroll step : Discard this item to place 3 hit tokens in the damage box Trinket 2 7 0
Colossal Bag of Loot Start of your Action : Discard this card o reveal the top four cards on the Bonus item deck. Each friendly character in your region may take any of the revealed items that are level 2 or lower, then discard the other revealed cards Trinket 2 7 0
Cowl of Heroes Start of your Dice Pool step : If you are in combat with at least one red creature, boss (including the Overlord), or enemy player, add 1 blue dice and 1 green dice to your dice pool Helmet - Cloth 2 9 0
Crest of Retribution Add 2 green dices to your dice pool. End of your Reroll step : Spot one 8 green dice to place 1 hot toekn in the damage box Shield - Mail 5 17 0
Cursed Ooze Jar Does not count towards your bag limit. Start of your Dice Pool step : Discard this card to place 1 curse token on each enemy participating character. You may only use one potion per combat round Potion 4 17 0
Doomshot Does not count toward you Bag limit. Start your Dice Pool step : If you have a Bow equipped, discard this card to add 2 blue dices and 2 red dices to your dice pool. You may only use one Ammo per combat round. Ammo 3 11 0
Electrocutioner Leg Add 2 red dices to your dice pool. Reroll +1. Start your Place Token step : You may place 1 hit token in the damage box Sword 3 13 0
Feathered Breastplate Add 3 green dices to your pool. During your Travel action : When you enter a region with one or more independent creatures, you do not have to stop traveling Leather 4 16 0
Felstone Good Luck Charm End of your Dice Pool step : Discard this card to reroll all your dice Trinket 4 16 0
Fist of Stone Add 4 red dices to your dice pool. Reroll -1 Attrition +3. Mace 3 8 0
-------HERE------------ Fist of the People\'s Militia Add 3 red dices to your dice pool. Reroll +2 Attrition +1 Mace 3 13 0
Gnomish Shrink Ray Place X armor tokens on this card. X is equal to the Energy you spend when you equip this card. Start of your Dice Pool step : Add a number of green dice to your dice pool equal to the number of armor tokens on this card. End of your Dice Pool step : Lose 1 armor token from this card for each 1 green dice or 2 green dice in your dice pool. Trinket 5 19 0
Greater Firestone Add 2 red dices to your dice pool. Trinket 4 14 0
Head of Grim\'shal Duuc Start of your Dice Pool step : You may unequip this card to reduce the Threat value of each opponent by 1 until the end of your Attack phase Head 3 12 0
Heartseeking Crossbow Add 2 blue dices to your dice pool. Start of your Reroll step : Place 1hit token in the damage box for each blue dice you spot with a result of at least 2 higher than your opponent\'s Threat value. Bow 3 12 0
Icicle Rod Add 2 red dices and 1 blue dice to your dice pool. Start of each combat round : Regain 1 energy Staff 3 10 0
Ironfoe Add 3 red dices to your dice pool. Start of your Reroll step : You may gain Reroll + 4 if you choose not to reroll any blue dice or any green dice. Mace 4 15 0
Jade Breastplate of Power Add 4 green dices and 1 red dice to your dice pool. Reroll + 1. Mail 5 22 0
Lorekeeper\'s Ring Your energy capacity is increased by 2. Start of each combat round : Regain 1 energy. Trinket 5 11 0
Lunar Wand of Arcane Wrath Add 3 blue dices to your dice pool. End of your Dice Pool step : you may spend any amount of your available Health to roll an equal number of additional blue dice. Wand 5 19 0
Outrider\'s Bow Add 4 blue dices to your dice pool. End of your Dice Pool step : You may change one 1 blue dice into a 7 blue dice. Bow 5 18 0
Pyric Caduceus Add 3 blue dices to your dice pool. End of your Reroll step : You may spend 2 Energy to place 2 hit tokens in the damage box Wand 4 14 0
Quel\'Serrar Add 4 red dices to your dice pool. End of your Reroll step : Spot one 8 red dice to place 1 armor token in the defense box Sword 5 20 0
Rageclaw Helm End of your Reroll step : If you did not roll any blue dice during this Dice Pool step, you may place an additional hit token in the damage box for 8 red dice you spot Helmet - Leather 4 13 0
Robe of Power Add 1 green dice to your dice pool. After you lose a Health : Once per combat round, you may spend up to 2 Energy. Regain 1 Health for each Energy you spend. Cloth 3 13 0
Robe of The West Add 2 green dices to your dice pool. End of your Dice Pool step : You may spend 1 Energy to gain Reroll + 2. Cloth 2 8 0
Runeblade of Baron Rivendare Add 3 red dices to your dice pool. End of your Reroll step : Regain 1 Energy for each 8 red dice you spot. Sword 4 14 0
Scroll of Teleportation Does not count towards your Bag limit. Using this card counts as an action. Roll 3 blue dices. If you roll at least one 6+ blue dice, you may place your character on any region containing one or more friendly characters. Scroll 3 13 0
Scroll of The Whale Does not count towards your Bag limit. Using this card counts as an action. End of your Dice Pool step : Discard this card to change up to four red or blue dices into an equal number of 8 green dices. You may only use one Scroll per combat round. Scroll 2 7 0
Scrying Orb Immediately before your faction draws a new quest : Draw 2 cards from the deck and choose which quest to put into play. Place the other quest on the bottom of its deck. Then unequip this card. Trinket 3 10 0
Seal of Ascension During your Character Management step : You may equip items that are one level higher than your character. Trinket 3 11 0
Shadowforge Bushmaster Add 4 blue dices to your dice pool. End of your Reroll step : Spot one 7+ blue dice to place 2 hit tokens in the damage box. Gun 4 15 0
Skullflame Shield During your Place Tokens step : Place 1 hit token in the attrition box for each armor token you place in the defense box. Shield - Mail 5 20 0

Stormrager Add 3 blue dices to your dice pool. If you have 6 or more available Energy, add an additional 2 red dices to your dice pool. Wand 4 11 0
Ta\'Kierthan Songblade Add 2 red dices to your dice pool. End of your Reroll step : Spent up to 3 of your available Health. Change one red dice into an 8 red dice for each Health you spend. Sword 3 12 0
